title: Crypto Market 2026 Predictions: Which Coins Will 10x and Which Will Crash?
description: Investor interest in crypto heading into 2026 is heating up, and Wall Street giants are eyeing significant gains. JPMorgan analysts, for example, have called $94,000 a bottom for Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) and forecast the asset could reach about $170,000 in 2026. Vitalik Buterin likewise laid out a roadmap to make Ethereum’s (CRYPTO: ETH) layer-1 network ... title: Bitcoin’s $732B Capital Inflow Proves This Isn’t Crypto Winter But a Mid-Cycle Reset
description: Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) has seen $732 billion in new capital inflows since its 2022 cycle low, exceeding all previous bull runs combined. This surge in institutional and ETF-driven investment has pushed Bitcoin’s realized market cap to record highs—$1.1 trillion—even as prices consolidate below peak levels. Past crypto winters brought panic but this wave of capital ...
